kindred.view.cli

Class Atom

  • Object
    • kindred.view.cli.Atom

  •  class Atom
extends Object
    Represents an Atom of a matrix to be shown in a command-line user interface.

    Each Atom contains a Character, a background colour and a foreground colour.

    Author:
    Kindred Team
